title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: When switching perspectives in the application, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized. This behavior is incorrect as a view that is maximized should stay maximized across perspectives.
OB: After switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
EB: The CVS repository view should remain maximized even after switching perspectives.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Maximize the CVS repository view.
3. Switch to a different perspective.
4. Observe that the CVS repository view is no longer maximized.
